titles.title: To provide for an accurate disclosure on individual pay checks of payments made under the Federal Insurance Contributions Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 1/6/1999--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require the disclosure, on employee pay statements, of employer contributions under the Federal Insurance Contributions Act.
